Pniewo  () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Węgorzewo, within Węgorzewo County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland, close to the border with the Kaliningrad Oblast of Russia. It lies approximately  south-west of Węgorzewo and  north-east of the regional capital Olsztyn.
